content: use this easy crochet hand towel pattern to make hand towels for your own kitchen or bathroom or to give as gifts you ll love the simple stitch pattern that produces a lovely textured towel this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size approximately 14 5 by 23 hook size us size h/8 5 0 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight cotton yarn main stitches chain half_double_crochet the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern
